scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npx rimraf node_modules
scripts.precreate:report: npm run clean && npx mkdirp license-report
scripts.create:report: npm run create:report:es6 && npm run create:report:react && npm run create:report:scss && npm run create:report:selenium && npm run create:report:nest
scripts.create:report:es6: npm run license-report --prefix ../src-client-es6 && npx move-file ../src-client-es6/license-report/license-report.json license-report/license-report.es6.json
scripts.create:report:react: npm run license-report --prefix ../src-client-react && npx move-file ../src-client-react/license-report/license-report.json license-report/license-report.react.json
scripts.create:report:scss: npm run license-report --prefix ../src-scss && npx move-file ../src-scss/license-report/license-report.json license-report/license-report.scss.json
scripts.create:report:nest: npm run license-report --prefix ../src-server-nest && npx move-file ../src-server-nest/license-report/license-report.json license-report/license-report.nest.json
scripts.deploy:report: npm run deploy:report:es6 && npm run deploy:report:react
